Allow one to specify filters and servlets to serve.

Also, configure missing configuration classes, as well as the
eventtracker library.

base: introduce base server

base features a ServerModuleBuilder to create a rest server with the
entire stack (including tracker filter, arecibo, ...).

core now simply sets up the jersey/jetty stack.
